text:
They cooked the books on us America it’s greed and politics 
We’ll never know how many people died from other ailments besides Coronavirus 
Medicare pays $13000 for every covid  death and $39000 for every  dead Covid patient who has been on a ventilator 
Follow the money

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
